Source.Name: raptor2
Source.Summary: Library that provides a set of parsers and serializers that generate Resource Description Framework (RDF) triples.
Source.Description: Library that provides a set of parsers and serializers that generate Resource Description Framework (RDF) triples by parsing syntaxes or serialize the triples into a syntax.
